resources.string:
"Turn 'ON' the switch on the top right. ↗️⊙.⊙↗️ With accessibility authorization, you'll get the best typing experience on different apps!
Note: You may receive a system reminder about authorizing, RainbowKey will NEVER collect ANY of your information."
To set up keyboard, please find and enable %1$s.
Without Accessibility permission, you can still enable %1$s manually.
Please try again or set up keyboard manually.
RainbowKey - Color your keyboard with personalized themes, Gifs and fonts.
My personalized keyboard made with #%1$s \n http://rainbowkey.com
Customize your own keyboard with your favorite pictures! Download #%1$s For Free:\n http://rainbowkey.com
Hey, you have to try the app %1$s keyboard. You can c͙u͙s͙t͙o͙m͙i͙z͙e͙ your keyboard with your own pictures! And the ⒻⓄⓃⓉⓈ and emojis are awesome. Download #%2$s For Free:\n http://rainbowkey.com
